articles.title: Ant Group's Jack Ma called in to talk to Chinese regulators ahead of IPO
articles.description: Chinese regulators summoned billionaire tech tycoon Jack Ma, co-founder of Ant Group, and other executives for questioning, just days before the company's highly anticipated public debut.

articles.author: Isaac Engelberg and Hollie Silverman, CNN
articles.title: A court has ordered a Northern California church to stop holding large indoor services in defiance of Covid-19 restrictions
articles.description: A church in Northern California has been ordered by a court to stop holding large indoor gatherings in violation of public health orders created to stop the spread of Covid-19.

articles.title: Trump's final campaign pitch is a false warning of 'cheating' in Pennsylvania

articles.author: Shelby Lin Erdman
articles.title: Type 2 diabetes drug metformin recalled due to contamination with possible carcinogen
articles.description: Two lots of a widely used type 2 diabetes medication, metformin, are being recalled due to possible contamination with a potentially cancer-causing compound. Metformin is designed to lower glucose levels.

articles.title: Pregnant women with Covid-19 face higher risk of severe illness and death, study says
articles.description: Pregnant women infected with the coronavirus are more likely to become severely ill and die from Covid-19, and they're at increased risk for premature delivery, according to a pair of reports released Monday by the US Centers for Disease Control and Preventio…

articles.author: Analysis by Ronald Brownstein
articles.title: Who wins the Senate? Watch the presidential race
articles.description: Senate races across the country are converging with the trend in the presidential race in that same state, underscoring the increasingly parliamentary nature of American elections.

articles.title: Mueller investigated -- but didn't charge -- Stone, WikiLeaks and Assange for Russian hack of Democrats in 2016, less-redacted report shows

articles.author: Zachary Cohen, CNN
articles.title: US Cyber Command expands operations against Russia, China and Iran
articles.description: US Cyber Command expanded its operations aimed at identifying malicious foreign cyber actors before Tuesday's presidential election, using missions to not only seek out Russian hackers, but those from Iran and China as well, a US official confirmed to CNN.
